entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
